select
from flight_company where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND STATUS = 1
mapper.delete: delete from flight_company where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND STATUS = 1
mapper.insert: insert into flight_company (ID, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, STATUS, EXT_1, EXT_2, INSERT_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update flight_company
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=BIT},
EXT_1 = #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXT_2 = #{ext2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
INSERT_TIME = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update flight_company set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, EXT_1 = #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXT_2 = #{ext2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, INSERT_TIME = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM flight_company WHERE NAME LIKE #{name} AND STATUS = 1
SELECT * FROM flight_company WHERE NAME = #{name} AND STATUS = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM flight_company WHERE STATUS = 1
SELECT * FROM flight_company WHERE STATUS = 1 limit #{startNo},#{pageSize}
